record.field: The contract %(contract)s does not have an invoice starting on the %(effective_date)s. Select another date.
The date %(date)s is not compatible with the billing mode %(mode)s.
Please set a new direct debit account.
Be careful, posterior billing mode will be erased %(dates)s.
Payer does not own this account, do you want it to change?
The selected contract is not paid through direct debit.
The selected endorsement cannot take place in the past.
